name: Solo Leveling Figurine
description: Unleash the Shadow Monarch:  This epic Solo Leveling figurine brings your favorite hunter to life! (great for fans of Sung Jin-Woo)

name: Mini Solo Leveling Model
description: Power Up Your Collection: Take home a mini Solo Leveling model and relive the thrilling battles! (perfect for displaying on desks or shelves)

name: LED Light Solo Leveling
description: Light Up the Night:  This anime LED light featuring Solo Leveling will illuminate your room with hunter-grade style! (unique collectible and conversation starter)

name: Sung Jinwoo PhotoCard
description: The King's Portrait: Carry Sung Jin-Woo with you wherever you go with this collectible Solo Leveling photo card! (a must-have for any Solo Leveling fan)

name: Solo Leveling Keychain
description: Level Up Your Style: Rep your hunter pride with this officially licensed Solo Leveling keychain. A high-quality accessory for any fan!

name: Solo Leveling Flash Photocard
description: Become a Hunter: Unleash the power of this shimmering Solo Leveling Flash Photocard. A dynamic collectible for dedicated fans!

name: Solo Leveling Mouse Pad
description: Own the Battlefield: Dominate your desk with this epic Solo Leveling mouse pad.  Large, comfortable, and featuring your favorite characters!

name: Solo Leveling Wall Decor
description: Level Up Your Space: Showcase your love for Solo Leveling with this high-quality wall decor.  A vibrant statement piece for any room!

name: Solo Leveling Cotton Shirt
description: Dress Like a Hunter: Train in style with this officially licensed Solo Leveling cotton shirt. Comfortable, high-quality, and perfect for everyday wear!

name: Solo Leveling Edition High-Quality
description: Unleash the Ultimate Hunter:  This premium Solo Leveling Edition offers exclusive high-quality content. A must-have for serious collectors!
